author: Gamers Nexus
description:
Sponsor: ID-Cooling Frozn A720 Black on Amazon https://geni.us/VDnou4Y
This hardware news recap for the week covers more RTX 50 Super series rumors and more NVIDIA N1X rumors, ASUS leaking AMD's new CPUs by accident, a PC case themed like a Founders Edition GPU, commentary on an NVIDIA "split," and 1080 Ti support going away.

Sources doc: https://www.one-tab.com/page/tRSrK_vGSB-_4xRpZnIghg

The best way to support our work is through our store: https://store.gamersnexus.net/

Like our content? Please consider becoming our Patron to support us: http://www.patreon.com/gamersnexus

TIMESTAMPS

00:00 - Recap for the Week
01:11 - Rumor: RTX 50 Super GPUs
05:11 - Cadence Pays Fine for Breaking Law
08:07 - US on NVIDIA "Split"
10:52 - Maingear Responds to GN
14:11 - Lian Li Unveils O11D Mini V2
15:17 - Asus Leaks AMD Ryzen 7 9700F
16:11 - NVIDIA N1X Spotted in FurMark Database
17:19 - Golden Field Reveals FE GPU Case
18:23 - Windows 10 Turns 10, Dies
19:12 - NVIDIA to End 1080 Ti Game-Ready
title: HW News - RIP 1080 Ti, US Talks NVIDIA "Split," ASUS Leaks AMD's CPUs, Maingear Responds to GN
